original_text: This made the people become angry against Stephen. The important Jews and the teachers of God's Law also became very angry. So they took hold of Stephen. They took him to stand in front of the group of Jewish leaders.
korean_text: 백성과 장로와 서기관들을 충동시켜 와서 잡아가지고 공회에 이르러

sentences.original_text: This made the people become angry against Stephen.
sentences.korean_translation: 이것 때문에 사람들이 스데펜에게 화가 났습니다.

sentences.original_text: The important Jews and the teachers of God's Law
So they took hold of Stephen.
They took him to stand in front of the group of Jewish leaders.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 유대 지도자들 앞에 서도록 데려갔습니다.
